articles.author: Christopher Carbone
articles.title: Australia's Kangaroo Island shows burn scars on one-third of land in stunning NASA image
articles.description: NASA's Terra satellite captured the extent of damage from the wildfires that ravaged Australia's Kangaroo Island.
articles.content:
NASA's Terra satellite captured the extent of damage from the wildfires that ravaged Australia's Kangaroo Island.
In the second image, seen below, the devastation can clearly be seen, as one-third of the island -- 155,000 hectares or 383,013 acres -- shows b… [+962 chars]

articles.author: Gerren Keith Gaynor
articles.title: Baby adorably attacks mom with kisses in viral video
articles.description: If you’re in need of a smile, you’re in luck.
articles.content:
If you’re in need of a smile, you’re in luck.
A video of a baby showering her mother with a load of kisses has captured the Internet’s hearts.

articles.title: Former Sens. Lott, Daschle on Iranian retaliation for Soleimani strike, lessons from Clinton impeachment
articles.description: Former Senate Majority Leader Trent Lott and former Senate Minority Leader Tom Daschle join Bret Baier on 'Special Report.'

articles.author: Bradford Betz
articles.title: Georgia man arrested for stealing mother’s electronics, demanding money, police say
articles.description: A Georgia man was arrested Sunday for stealing electronic devices from his 73-year-old mother then intimidating her into giving him money for them to be returned, according to police.
articles.content:
A Georgia man was arrested Sunday for stealing electronic devices from his 73-year-old mother then intimidating her into giving him money for them to be returned, according to police.
